conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is John and I'm a Sales Development Representative at DeepData AI. I came across Axonius and was impressed with the work you're doing in the cybersecurity space. I wanted to reach out and see if our data processing solution could be a good fit for your team.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Hi John, I'm the CTO here. We're always looking for ways to improve our data processing, but I have to say, our plate is pretty full right now. What makes DeepData AI different from the other solutions out there?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great question. Our AI-powered engine allows for faster and more accurate data processing, which can help reduce costs and improve overall efficiency. We've seen some great success with similar companies in the cybersecurity industry.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see. Well, we do have some existing relationships with other data processing vendors, and I'm not sure if we're ready to invest in a new solution right now. Plus, I'd need to get buy-in from our IT team, which can be a challenge. What kind of pricing are we looking at?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing is competitive, and we offer customized plans based on the specific needs of each company. I'd be happy to discuss pricing in more detail and see if we can find a plan that works for you. We've also had success integrating with other cybersecurity platforms, so I think we could make it work with your existing systems.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate that, but to be honest, we're in the middle of a major project right now and just don't have the bandwidth to take on a new vendor. We're also concerned about the potential disruption to our current workflows. I'm not sure if this is something we can prioritize right now.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand that timing can be a challenge. Would it be possible to schedule a follow-up conversation in a few months to revisit the opportunity? Maybe we could also offer a trial or pilot to help demonstrate the value of our solution and minimize any disruption.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the follow-up offer, John, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. We just have too much on our plate, and this isn't a priority for us at the moment. I appreciate your understanding, and I wish you the best of luck with your sales efforts.
